import * as React from "react"; import "./style.css"; export function App() { return ( {/*

Welcome to the Universe of ETH Gobblers

Gamified Blockchain patronage for a new digital era.

What is elastic supply?

Elastic supply refers to the combination of the novel burning mechanism [deflationary] and the ability to split your GOOEYs into 2 separate GOOEYs [inflationary].

The initial GOOEY supply of the ETH Gobblers collection is 2000, but this number increases as GOOEYs undergo mitosis and decreases when GOOEYs get buried. GOOEY owners may perform various activities to keep GOOEYs alive, or let them die and pass on to the next realm.

What is a GOOEY?

A GOOEY is your own living, breathing, dynamic creature NFT that lives in a super cute Tamagotchi-style web 3 application. GOOEYs need your love and support to thrive, divide into more GOOEYs and drop gifts along the way.

Each GOOEY has it's own base traits, disposition, taxonomy and age. GOOEYs can also be equipped with new unique add-ons, claimable to those who keep their GOOEYs healthy and happy.

Each GOOEY and base traits were hand designed with love by Omakasea Art Director Dudette. [ https://twitter.com/DatArtPerson ]

Caring for your GOOEY

Every GOOEY has a health bar which loses health points [HP] gradually over time. If your GOOEY's health bar runs out, your GOOEY dies and may get buried forever. This means if people don't care for their GOOEY, the supply will decrease. Keep in mind, as HP decreases, it becomes more difficult to care for your GOOEY.

What happens if your GOOEY's health bar goes to 0?

When your GOOEY's health falls to 0, it becomes at risk of getting buried. Anyone can call the "bury" function on a GOOEY that has lost all of it's HP. Calling this function sends the GOOEY to the burn address, decreasing it from the supply forever. You can revive your GOOEY by feeding it before it gets buried to restore HP.

What happens when your GOOEY health bar is full?

Your GOOEY is healthy. It will reward you with special prizes over time.

How much ETH does it take to split your GOOEY into 2?

The amount of ETH it takes to split your GOOEY is proportional to the floor price and depends on the elastic supply of the collection. As the supply grows, the ETH to mitosis increases to slow inflation. As more GOOEYs get buried, the ETH to mitosis decreases to boost inflation.

Certain drops produced by healthy GOOEYs that when equipped, decrease the amount of the ETH needed to undergo mitosis. For example, one of the more rare drops gives a 50% discount off the base cumulative cost.

What can I do with the GOOEY my GOOEY buds?

Anything you want! Your new GOOEY is an entirely separate ERC-21 token which can then be sold on secondary marketplaces, given away to a friend/family/community member, or kept safe in your wallet.

How do you gain health points [HP]?

You can raise your GOOEY's health by feeding ETH to your GOOEY, grooming it, or putting it to sleep.

Feed: Feed your GOOEY 1x, 5x or FEAST pert TX. FEAST calculates the amount of ETH remaining that is needed to undergo mitosis and feeds your GOOEY that amount.

Groom: Groom your GOOEY once per TX. Grooming increases your HP by a significantly larger amount than feeding.

Sleeping: Put your GOOEY to sleep once per TX. Sleeping restores 100% of HP but comes with side effects. Your GOOEY remains asleep for a random time (no longer than one week). While asleep, HP decreases at a slower than usual rate and feeding nor grooming can be done.

What other benefits are there to keeping my GOOEY alive?

Traits: An endlessly growing collection of variable rarity, claimable, unlockable traits that you can equip to your GOOEY with various utilities.

Alpha: Secret in-app alpha drops [think important points from Twitter Spaces, insider secrets that are too based to talk about openly, access to pre-recorded content, etc.]

One-of-One Art: unlock special one-of-one artworks.

Where does the ETH you feed to your GOOEY go?

The ETH you feed to your GOOEY goes back to the Omakasea development team. This ETH will be used for: putting food in our team's mouths, supporting our families, and funding development so we can continue making dop shit for the ecosystem [such as mglth.tv, omakasea.com, and etc.]. We hope that the ETH Gobblers model can be used by other teams/artists/developers to boost their operations.

How can the ETH Gobblers model support artists and creators through a new form of gamified patronage?

The ETH Gobblers model is a gamification that incentivizes holders [via claimable drops, community access, or whatever the creator decides] to deposit ETH into a contract over time. We believe that this is an ideal on-chain solution as an alternative to softwares such as Patreon, Kofi, etc. to help independent project teams get ahead.

How to Play

HP Breakdown

Your Gooey will lose between 6 and 10 health daily, this variable is randomized. Pricing for performing each action is subject to change, and is gnerally based on the Average Gooey floor price over the past 24 hours.

Feeding Grooming Sleeping
.001 ETH to Feed x1. 1 Feed increases health by 5 HP. Feasting triggers mitosis, the mitosis threshold is 20% below time weighted average floor price as determined by marketplace and aggregator APIs. .01 ETH to Groom increases health by 55 HP. .03 ETH to put your Gooey into a state of hibernation lasting anywhere from 4-7 days, this time variable is randomized. While sleeping, your Gooey loses half as much HP per day (3-5 HP). Sleeping increases health by 100 HP.

The Gooey Gobbler

At all times one random Gooey is the Gooey Gobbler. The Gooey Gobbler can pay a fee to the contract to gobble anyone else's Gooey. When that Gooey is gobbled, the gobbler receives the Gooey that they gobbled, and the Gobbler role is assigned to a new random Gooey. Don't worry though, as it is in life, if misfortune befalls you and your Gooey is gobbled, you may find that good fortune is just around the corner. This functionality has yet to go live, but we will give more specific information about it when it does.

GobDrops

If you have cumulatively fed your Gooey .05 ETH, you will be eligible for trait drops when they occur. Please note that this price is subject to change depending on the particular drop, as there are different types of drops.

Besides just making your Gooey look cooler and more unique, traits can provide extra benefits when it comes to taking care of your Gooey. Some unlockable traits possess hidden magical powers that will make it easier to care for your Gooey, such as slowing down the rate of HP loss, feeding boosts, and other yet to be revealed functionality.

We will be releasing a more definite timeline of upcoming GobDrops in the coming week, with the first trait drop for all holders coming in the first week of January, 2023. The traits included in these drops are their own ERC-721 NFTs that can be traded openly, and are not influenced at all if you sell your Gooey, your Gooey dies, or your Gooey gets gobbled by the Gooey Gobbler.

Types of traits: background, weather, cushion, food, wings, accessories, sidekicks, inflight.

There are 3 collection supply possibilities for GobDrops

  • Generative trait collection (animated or still image)
  • 1/1s editions: each 1/1 can have 0-1000 editions
  • 1/1s: only one available

There are 3 creation/distribution models for GobDrops

  • In-house drops: Crafted solely by Dudette {`&`} core team
  • Artist-in-residence program:

    Omakasea is holding an open call for visual artists (illustrators, animators) to work with us for a period of time (ideally 2-3 months) to create special 1/1s editions and equippable traits for the gooeys. The artist in residence will receive a stipend and name credit for their work.

  • Community Collab:

    We will reach out to other Web3 communities that we like (ex: Doodles, Milady Maker, etc.) to help us curate and create equippable traits, special 1/1s editions, and super rare background 1/1s, that are claimable by Gooey holders who also hold the collaborating collections in their wallet as well as other wallets that they link via signature to the ETH Gobblers dApp.

Artist Residencies

If you are interested in applying for our Artist Residency program, you can do so via this form:{' '} https://docs.google.com/document/d/1yfcEX3wMrBF5jlYnvYtB64lpdajEDWWlyzVqv9a7lxl/edit

The Gooey Dungeons

Dungeon challenges will begin at the end of Q1.

Gooey Disposition

Each Gooey was minted via an invite link which indicated whether the minter was on the Naughty list or the Nice list. This impacts the disposition of your Gooey. Naughty Gooeys have 2 face types, and Nice Gooeys also have 2 face types. When you perform Mitosis on a Gooey, the disposotion follows from the parent. As of now, there are no plans for functionality based on the disposition of Gooeys, it's just a fun trait that speaks to the character of your Gooey.
